## Bio

I work at the intersection of learning analytics, educational research, and data science. In my current role, I serve as the Assistant Dean for Digital Innovation and Data Scientist for [USG eCampus](https://www.ecampus.usg.edu "USG eCampus provides high quality and affordable online learning experiences to all public colleges & universities in the State of Georgia.").

## Degrees & Certificates

-   **Georgia State University:** *Master of Science (M.S.) in Educational Research, Measurement & Statistics (2023)*
-   **University of North Georgia:** *Post-Master's Certificate in Transfer Leadership & Practice (2019)*
-   **Georgia Southern University:** *Master of Education (M.Ed.) in Higher Education Administration (2015)*
-   **Georgia State University:** *Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) in Religious Studies & Philosophy (2011)*
